content.detailedDescription:
Seen ufo driving home,followed it for 2 blocks,hit a dead end road,then drove home,left at 8 pm for a 10 minute drive home,got home at 12 15 am,lost 4 hours some how,the ufo was cigar shaped,one light on both ends and one on top,
another encounter i had,i was in bed sleeping a ufo was hovering out side of my house an 2 greys came and got me,they showed me a crystal helmet,with a blue button on the side of it,they put it on my head and your thoughts
would control your levitation,fast slow or what ever,when they left i took the helmet and put it beside my bed,first thing in the morning i looked beside my bed and the helmet was gone,i thought it was just a dream,but acording to the newspaper that day a ufo was reported by several people that
night.This was in 1984 i think.The aliens were friendly,the ufo was disk
shaped.
content.summary: Cigar shaped, one light on both ends and one on top, then lost 4 hours of time

content.detailedDescription:
I was outside letting my dogs out in our backyard when i noticed a weird glowing light hovering so i decided to get my cell phone and film. then a bigger object appeard out of no where and seemed to get closer. the larger object looked as if it was spinning in circles. i zoomed in with my binoclulars and it had a weird disc shape with 3 round lights in the middle. the smaller object looked like a light blue orb wich was just hovering for a while and then dissapeared after the large object has.
afterwards a , what seems to be, dark helicopter rushed overhead going towards the direction the bigger object had went. 

to mufon: ((cant attach video, i need to send it by link,  please get back to me asap ))
content.summary: Blue light/orb then bigger object appears

content.detailedDescription:
This report is being filed by craig lang, of the mufon abduction research team and minnesota state director. 

i was contacted at 3:13 pm cdt by the primary witness, who reported a ufo abduction event. he did not want his name used in the report, so i am filing it with the witness name withheld. i have added my own phone number and e-mail in the original report.

this report is being filed as a place-holder for the cms case.

the primary witness gave me his contact information, which i passed on to fletcher gray (star team lead), cathy richards (oh sd) and tom wertman (oh ci).

witness and his daughter's boyfriend were fishing (location given to fletcher and tom), and observed a light at about 1am. they watched it, and then realized that it was first light.

the primary witness described the beginning and end of the missing time to be 1:37am and 5:19am respectively.

the two men returned to the witness' pickup truck and changed clothes out of their fishing clothing into everyday clothes. at that time they noticed markings on their bodies. 

witness later found that he had marks over an estimated 40% of his body.

i asked the witness to save the clothes, to both photograph and sketch the marks on his body, and to write down everything he could remember. 
also to have the other witness do the same.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Fishermen sighting and missing time

content.detailedDescription:
My sighting occurred on, or about, april 19, 1979 and involved both my visual sighting and visual and radar sighting from the memphis international airport air traffic control tower (atct). my story begins with a phone call from my best friend on sunday morning april 14 as i recall. he was excited and related the sighting that he had witnessed the previous night while at the southwest twin drive-in theater. he said he had noticed people getting out of their cars at one point during the movie and looking up at the sky. he did likewise and saw 4 red lights moving over the drive in in a square or diamond formation. after the ufos hovered silently over the drive in for a few minutes they suddenly departed at great speed in four different directions. i believe this sighting was reported in the local newspaper.

my story:

at that time i was employed by the memphis-shelby county airport authority as the senior airfield electrician for memphis international airport. at that time i had been working on the airfield for about 3 years and was very familiar with aircraft, on the ground and in the air, both during the day and at night. i also had a close relationship with the controllers in the atct as i interacted with them on a daily basis in the course of maintaining the runway and taxiway lighting systems. for clarification of the story i also need to point out that my wife had just given birth to our first daughter on april 4th and was at home recuperating. at the time we lived about 3 miles southwest of the airport. it was advantageous for me to live close to the airport as i was on call 24 hours in case of any airfield lighting problems.

on the afternoon of april 19 i had arrived home from work about 4:00 pm and shortly thereafter my wife put the baby down for a nap and ask me to be sure to not let anything wake the baby up as she was going to take a well-deserved soak in the tub. i should also point out that i am a licensed amateur radio operator and therefore decided to do a bit of listening to one of my radios to pass the time. i had an air-band vhf radio in the spare bedroom and i turned it on and tuned around the band to listen to the airport tower and local air traffic. i happened upon the west approach frequency for the airport and immediately heard a conversation between the memphis atct and a small beechcraft airplane that was on approach to the airport. the controller on frequency called the pilot of the aircraft and ask if they could see anything off their right wing, which would be to the south. the controller stated that they had received some ufo reports from that direction. the pilot immediately responded that yes, he could see something that appeared as 4 red lights hovering in the distance. the controller responded that they could not see them from the tower but they had requested the memphis police helicopter to check it out and they were in route.  he also stated that they were painting something on radar but could not tell what it was.

at this time i tuned the radio to the “local” or “tower” frequency which is the frequency used for aircraft on final approach to a runway, as i knew that because of their usual low altitude flight, this was the frequency that the police helicopter monitored. i immediately heard the police helicopter pilot in conversation with another controller in the tower cab regarding the ufo (the previous controller was downstairs in the tracon looking at a radar screen). the pilot stated that they had the ufos in sight and were in position underneath them and making an attempt to get closer by ascending. however, he said that the ufos appeared to be ascending at the same rate as they could not get any closer to them. at this point the tower cab supervisor whom i knew well came up on the frequency and said that they could now see the objects from the tower. as i was located only about 3 miles away to the southwest i thought perhaps if i went out in my driveway i could also see them. this meant however that i could no longer monitor the radio conversation.

i ran out the screen door onto my carport and out to the driveway and looked to the west and could see three red lights and the police helicopter a distance underneath. the weather conditions were a relatively solid overcast that i would estimate at about 2-3000 ft., perhaps lower. i retrieved my binoculars from my truck and proceeded to stand up on the tailgate of the truck and observe the objects. they appeared as glowing red lights similar to the obstruction lights on a radio tower. the first thing i noticed was the helicopter depart the area, to this day, i still don’t know why, perhaps an emergency call of some sort. i continued observing the objects and noticed the one to my right seemed to me changing color or “strobing” from red to white. it was almost imperceptible at the time but over the course of a few moments it became more pronounced and rapid. suddenly the craft shot off to the right (north) and disappeared at incredible speed. i jerked the binoculars down from my eyes just in time to see it disappear. i cannot say if it disappeared into the clouds or just went out of sight.

now if you recall my 1 ½ week old daughter that i was supposed to be listening for was still asleep in the house….At that moment the phone just inside the screen door began ringing and i knew this might wake up the baby and invoke the wrath of my wife so i immediately ran to the door and answered the phone and promptly hung up on the telemarketer on the other end of the line. i ran out to the driveway and looked in the direction of the objects but much to my disappointment, the remaining two were gone. i know this sighting was reported by several people and was covered by the local newspaper. i learned some time later from a mufon investigator that the national enquirer had done a story on it and interviewed the atct supervisor.

not a visually incredible sighting but one with good elements of radar confirmation and visual sighting by atct personnel and pilots as well as myself.
content.summary: Red glowing objects also observed by air traffic controllers, pilots and on radar

content.detailedDescription:
While outside waiting to go to work i looked up and spotted a star like object moving slowly to the north east. i alerted a friend who was standing with me and he spotted it also. the object traveled north east for about 2 miles and then turned and started moving south west.

after it traveled about 3 to 4 miles it stopped and hovered . it then moved slightly to the right and back to the left. a small patch of clouds pasted over it and when the clouds moved on the object was no longed there.

i also have to report seeing a object in the same spot about 2 months ago. this object seems to light up out of nowhere a very bright light, then the light would fade out and the object would also fade out. i found this event a little strange because it happened the same way in the same spot for about 3 months. i have mot seen it again for about 2 months now.
content.summary: Slow moving object changes direction and hovers in syracuse sky 8/29/14

content.detailedDescription: On january 7th , 2013 at 6:00 am , i experienced something unreal... we had gotten up to let our canines out after they woke me up... after we let them in , i was standing in the living room door and happened to look down at my stereo speaker... the front of the speaker , just below the felt cover , was softly flickering a orangish glow... i thought i might have been seeing things , so i kept looking at it and it did it again... i was standing there in the dark , fully alert watching this happen in front of me(only about 4 feet away)... then my wife walked into the room from a different entry way and witnessed it as well... it eventually just faded out... before i described anything to her , i asked her to describe to me what she saw... she said she saw an actual 'orange orb of light' from where she was standing... needless to say , i did not go back to sleep... it wasn't really a 'scary' experience... just a 'strange' one...
content.summary: On january 7th , 2013 at 6:00 am , we witnessed an orange orb of light in our home...

content.detailedDescription: I am filling this out for a friend of mine who is a night janitor at a high school north of kcmo. i think this is one you need to check into, he has video of this and has seen this thing nightly for the last 3 weeks or longer .. he said he called some number and no body called back. i told him he needs to fill this form out. he has no computer. i have seen some of the video and i think this is one of the 15 percent that is worth checking into, i have one photo that was forwarded to me from his cell phone, the other videos he has are to large to send from his cell to mine, i am putting his phone number under work number, and his name is behind mine in parentheses, i filled the form out the best i could but you really need to contact him to get exact description of these sightings and to see the other video he has. they are truly hair raising to see.
content.summary: Ship with lights hovering then leaving

content.detailedDescription: on august 2nd , 2013 , i spotted what looked like a classic "orange sphere" or "orb" just south , south east of me about 60 degrees above the horizon in the sky... it was moving ever slowly north bound... i stood and watched it for about a minute , then i yelled in the house for my wife to come and see it... when she opened the door and came outside , it blinked out... then a few seconds later we saw it flash with a bright white light and shoot westward across the sky (90 degrees from it's original trajectory) very quickly at an unbelievable speed... then , disappearing once again... i asked her if she saw that and she confirmed yes she did...
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: On august 2nd , 2013 , i spotted what looked like the classic

content.detailedDescription:
I usually wake up once in the wee hours of the morning to pee then ritualistically go to the kitchen to get a swig of orange juice.  i had just done that and was going to go back to bed but remembered that the gated parking garage, adjacent to the short “high-rise” condo complex that i live in, was not gated for the past two days.  since i have a vehicle in that lot, and the vehicle is exposed to the street, i decided to take a look out of my living room window, which overlooks the parking lot, to check on my truck.  i had been a little worried about the truck overnight, because we have a ton of auto burglaries on our street, and in general, a lot of scuzzy people walking around up to no good late at night, early a.M.  
in order to get a good look at the parking lot, i had to lie down (on my belly), on my carpet.  we have a large window but the shade is always drawn, so i decided to lie down and look out the window.  truck was fine and i didn’t see anyone around but i noticed some lights on in a dilapidated building kitty corner to ours.  since i wasn’t feeling sleepy, i went and got my binoculars and took a look.  i was checking out the strangely nice furnishings inside of this dilapidated building when “it” happened.
i think i heard the low hum first.  the rest, i am absolutely 100% sure about.  i looked to my left, and a giant rectangular, flat, object was “floating” slowly in my direction from up high – gliding long side up, and then closer and closer.  it sort of “twisted” slowly which was a movement that i found incredulous for any manmade air craft.  it made no sense.  it then hovered for a time (maybe 2 minutes?) and it was “facing” me at a diagonal/slanted  angle.   there was a white light (not blinking) on each corner of the craft.  in the first moments of seeing this thing, my brain was trying to categorize it as an airplane or some kind of military jet and i couldn’t understand why there were only white lights as i know that our aircraft use colored lights to indicate port side or starboard.  then the shape of the object became clear to me – it was so close and so low.  and since it hovered for what seemed like a long time, i had a long time to look at it.  but even so, i feel fuzzy about what it really looked like with specific details.  i know that at the moment i realized it was absolutely a ufo, i was in absolute shock at what i was witnessing.  i thought my binoculars were starting to fog and put them to the side and i think the craft was emitting some kind of glow or steam.  i’m not sure about the foggy part.  … then, it put itself horizontal and glided up, and headed in a northern direction, staying quite low.
my husband was sleeping in the other room and i didn’t call out for him because i didn’t want to disturb what was happening by making a huge commotion, and even though i wished so badly i could go grab my camera i didn’t want to miss a moment of what i was seeing.
weather:  it was very dark out (for an urban city), and very quiet.  our street actually is not very well lit, which is unusual for the neighborhood.  the sky was dark, but it was clear overhead and i could see off on the northern horizon that there was a heavy band of low fog.  that was the direction the craft took off.
content.summary: On a path toward me in a

content.detailedDescription:
It began earlier that day, i was logging onto google for reasons that aren't strictly relevant, then received a notice on my google home-screen about the 'perseid meteor shower'. i was intrigued, and began investigating into it and trying to find out peak viewing times. after 22:00 (approx.)me and my family headed out, hopeful of seeing a meteorite. i set up my seating apparatus and sat down with a cup of tea, and watched the pitch black, but cloudy sky. after my family went off to bed, i felt no desire to retire for the evening and stayed on watching the hardly visible stars in the cloudy night sky. with no luck of seeing any meteors. i went in to replenish my tea cup. when i came out, i sat back down for a few minutes. suddenly, i saw what originally looked like a disk, travelling much slower than an aircraft. i'd observed about 30-40 commercial aircraft that night, another family member pointed out and drew attention to the large number of aircrafts, and i agreed. all the airplanes flashed green and red repeatedly, unlike the ufo i was seeing, which looked a lot like something out of the x-files. i looked again, and saw the craft change into a star like object. my eyes were fixated on the craft, that was easily mistakable for a very bright star, and i noticed it was still moving, slower than the speed of an aircraft with no flashing or pulsating lights. it didn't shine any ray of light or a tractor beam, just flew across the sky out of sight. 
my initial reaction was shocked, i was always optimistic about the idea of extra-terrestrial beings, but this was weird. the craft was a very strong white light; easily visible due to the dull lights of the other stars and the close proximity (it was brighter than the moon) of the object i saw that. the object didn't change colour or shape after the transformation between disk and star that night.  
there were no missing time periods and no unusual marks or scratches found on my person.
content.summary: Originally looked like a disk, then a star. i gradually noticed it fly across the sky.

content.detailedDescription:
Whilst walking from the apartment to the cave bar, we stopped to look at the stars in the sky, because it was so clear.  we noticed a white light shooting across the sky towards us from the ocean.  initially we thought it was a shooting star, but then it slowed and stopped just hovering there.  


it was orb like briliant white and had a pulsing yellow light around the edges that change in shade.

we were transfixed and joked about it being a alien space ship, but then it started moving closer again and completely changed direction at such a sharp angle we knew it wasn't possible.  

the speed with which it moved towards the coast of africa and disappeared was phenomenal.

we were shocked and knew what we had just seen was a ufo, as no aircraft we know of could possibly move that fast or change in direction with such a sharp movement at that speed.  we didn't know what to do, so we decided not to tell anyone, for fear of being rebuked.

we have never spoken about this until today, because we thought people would think us mad.  we contacted the site because we have recently watched other peoples stories on the television.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: White light spotted getting closer towards apartments from the direction of the ocean, became bigger pulsing with glow around edge of yellow that changed and pulsed, it stopped in mid air, moved slowly, completley changed direction, sped off and disapeare

content.detailedDescription: Same as described above.
content.summary: Flashing and flickering more than a star. other stars/planets visible at the time did not seem to flickr.

content.detailedDescription:
As i'm doing as i write this, at 4:30 am i took a break from work. i was working for a quiet town's police department. i lit a cigar and sat on a park bench facing east. for twenty minutes i watched a busy meteor display of shooting stars flowing west to east. at 4:50am, i looked over my right shoulder in a southwest direction. i saw either an elaborate prank or the greatest sighting of my life. just as i looked over my shoulder i observed a dark red "pinwheel" spinning in the sky. it was up about 65 degrees. as it spun it expanded. it was fixed, stationary. i took my iphone from my pocket and began recording. the event spun, creating an expanding hole in the center. after approximately 10 seconds it closed, leaving behind a cloud. 

two minutes later and while still recording, a second event occurred. just below the first event and slightly to my right, a white light appeared inside a small cloud. the light grew as did the cloud. it too ended and left the cloud remnants. 

i called another police officer over. i wanted a witness for any third event. he witnessed only the remnant clouds. 

i replayed the video and could see nothing. later my son played it on his television and we could see the entire event, but it's very small. i'm reporting this to mufon in the hopes that someone will assist me with enhancing and enlarging the video. i will provide the video following your contact.
content.summary: Two events, two minutes apart: red pinwheel vortex opened, then closed followed by growing white light inside self made growing cloud.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home in a car around 3am with my brother and my car was only oone on the road i looked to my left side and i saw about 50 feet away from me ufo flying along with the same speed as i'm driving 45mpr it was a shape like a football dork black color and only one light was on it.  it fly by me for like 4-5min and i had to torn right and ufo toke off like a rocket and i started flashing high beam lights at it, that ufo was at least 2-3mils away from me it didn't turn around it fly back to me with it's back and it took him at least 5-7 sec to get to me and i got scared so i started to speed going over 100mpr it fly right by me for 1-2min and then it just took off like a bullet with unbelievable speed and it was the last time i saw it.
content.summary: It was my first time seeing ufo and really  close to me wile driving and it was only my car on the road and my brother it follow us it was scary.

content.detailedDescription: I was out on the balcony enjoying the fresh air and the hundreds of stars above. then i see one of those stars move towards the west and it slowed down and as it was slowing down, it was fading. to the point that it was difficult to see it. suddenly it changed its course heading south and vanished without a trace. at first i thought it was just a satellite or a plane at a very high altitude. but then i thought that planes usually have blinking lights and they don't slow down, fade and suddenly change directions. same goes with satellites. but that thing didn't blink, it was as bright as a star then it faded, changed course and disappeared. it's not the first time i see that this year, witnessed a similar event the 11th of august. my dad that night also saw two star-like objects flying side by side then they disappeared. july and august are very "active" here for such events.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Trying to pass as a satellite maybe?

content.detailedDescription: Tonight the orb just flew south.I see them almost nightly. but one night my wife and i saw an orb doing hyroglific maneuvers in the sky for 30 min's and the next day the neighbor said he saw it too then it stopped and stayed in the same spot for an hour then slowly moved off to the east. another night i went out for a cigarette at 3am because i couldn't sleep and saw a laser like beam of light(about a foot wide and white in colour) come from the side of the house. it crossed the neighbors back yard across the street and the next neighbors back yard. at the time just thought it was the neighbor with a flashlight but thick cedar trees surround our yards. went around the corner of my house and didn't see anything so i went back to bed. the next morning my wife and i were having morning coffee on the deck and she finished and went to water the front garden. she came to the back yard screaming my name because she saw the remains of the neighbors pet rabbit spread all over our 2 lawns. the bulk of the fur was right where i saw the light come through the trees just 6 hours earlier. the neighbors white rabbit wasn't in it's cage and the type of cage it was in the door was in the top and they had a 5lb rock on it to keep it closed. the rock when i took the pictures was still on the cage or put back? the funny thing is there was white fur everywhere but no blood on anything? the white fur/grass,nowhere! as i followed the trail of fur from their yard to ours(20-25 feet) at the end of the trail in our yard found the rabbit's lower jaw bone with the teeth.(still have some fur and the jaw bone.) the funny thing is the neighbors weren't around and the next day they packed up and left without a word to anybody! being their ground floor bedroom window was 3 feet above the rabbit's cage i wonder what they heard or saw that spooked them so bad?
content.summary: I see obs all the time 7th one this week some have landed on my roof others come within 20 feet and one did  hieroglyph maneuvers that my wife/neighbors saw.

content.detailedDescription: I saw it twice.  first, i was driving south on hwy 43 in colbert county, alabama, just north of littleville in a strip of farm land known locally as the "cotton flats". there were angular clouds that come when fog is about to set in.  there was a sudden series of flashes that i thought was lightning at first to the southeast of my position.  i quickly realized that it was green and blue and all hews in between and couldn't be. i slowed the vehicle down and started realizing that the clouds were starting to glow with lights that seemed to be scanning outward. then the object/objects lowered beneath the cloud radiating still from blue to green and back again. it was two lines of circular (maybe slightly oval) lights in two parallel lines. i am awful with depth perception so the size (though cover a significant amount of space in the sky) would be impossible to accurately guess.  the lines would hover and then shift attitude ccontinuing the light show.  i was slowing down more and trying to reach for my phone in the floorboard to take a shot of it.  then the lights at the top of the parallel lines got closer together while the ones incthe back pinwheeled further apart.  both lines stayed straight but were at approximately 45 degee angles of each other.Then, they took off. i am not sure how to discribe this. it didnt fade away or simply disappear butit pointed ti the southeast and then jus went. it was so fast, my eyes peceived it like acloud of lights vanishing like a fast car would leave dust floating where it had been.  i thought i had lost my mind.  i travel another five to ten minutes south on 43 and begin coming inti russellville. it reappeared.  i grabbed my phone, got the camera pulled up continued driving and tried to snap a photo. i thought it had disappeared befire i could catch it on film but i managed to capture a streak of blue on the middle of the sky at the left center of the photograph.  that is basically it.  i sincerely though i had lost my mind after a long day on the road until i saw it the second time and caught that streak of light on the photo.  thanks for giving me a place to tell my story. i would love if you can explain this away.
content.summary: Two lines of lights that changed position s and disappeared

content.detailedDescription: Over at a friends house who lives on the next block over from my house. my brother and  another friend that was with us and the person who lived there was also outside with us while we were smoking. there is a horse pasture right by where we were smoking so there was no trees or obstructions that could make it seem odd. so we were just out there smoking and i noticed two oddly colored lights single orange red colored balls or what they seemed to be from a distance. the two objects flew in a formation  from the southwest but not how you would see two planes flying one was higher in the sky and the other was lower and seemed to be leading the higher object. they both stopped and seemed to hover still in the odd formation about a minute passed and we were trying to make sense of it when the higher object started moving west while the other was still hovering. the object flying west suddenly made a what i would say and impossible turn and was heading directly to the east and seemed to be coming right for us. all four of us were pointing and being loud at this point and it just came faster and faster. then it no longer had an orange reddish light it had two white lights underneath it the closer it came the bigger it got about a minute or so it was moving in the same direction and went right above us all where we all saw three white lights two in the back and one in the front there was no clear outline of the shape but the lights underneath gives me the idea it was triangular. when it was above us it seemed to be moving slower then before and shortly after it passed over us the two rear lights got bright and shot off east to the blue mountains. the lights were gone within a couple blinks of an eye after the lights got brighter. we all were in aw when we looked back to where the other object had seemed to be hovering and we saw the orange ish light and it just faded and was gone heading west or so i believe. strangest of all the objects had no sound and no flashing lights that most normal planes or helicopters do.
content.summary: Smoking a cigarette outside with three others three similar lights in some kind of formation.

content.detailedDescription:
I was watcing tv in the dark at around 1:15 am on august 28 when i saw a pair of lights through the window.  they were moving east at a high rate of speed.  it caught my attention because with the tv on stars and planes aren't usually visible.  the first object had an unusually bright white light shining that i assumed to be either landing lights of a plane or perhaps a searchlight from a helicopter.  i thought that was confirmed when the secnd object stopped and appeared to hover while the fist oject continued off to the east until it disappeared from view. 

as i watched the second objct hover it started flashing from a brilliant white to red to blue.  at this point i'm thinking it is a police helicopter or something.  just as i was about to lose interest, it zig zagged downward.  watching a little more, it slowly rose in the air then zig zagged downward the opposite direction.  it then rose again and appeared to make a circle in the sky.  at this point i began to wonder if my eyes were just playing tricks on me.  i woke my mother and she observed the same behaviour.  the object spent probably 20 minutes slowly rising or lowering only to zip around back to where it started.  

approimatey 10 or 15 minutes into both of us watching this thing, we became aware of what looked like extremely frequent flashes of lightening to the northwest.  i don't know if it is in any way related, but ther was no thunder or sound at all associated with either the object or lightening.  

about 30 minutes into the sighting, we both observed that the object appeared to heading north at about a 10 to 20 degree incline.  it took a good 15 minutes to disappear from view and then the lightening stopped.  for the duration of the sighting both i and my mother had a "creepy" feeling.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: I observed a flashing object hovering and darting about the sky for over a half hour.

content.detailedDescription: Was driving from st pete home to new port richey up mcmullen booth rd/little rd, unidentified craft was hovering above tree line, forward wing designs with lights on tips,  i know most aircraft, it wasn't anything im familiar with...I'm left baffled
content.summary: Was driving from st pete home to new port richey up little rd craft was hovering i know aircraft, it wasnt anything im familiar with

content.detailedDescription:
I was in millbrae, ca (near the burlingame border) walking my dog just before 10:30p. i happened to look up towards the sfo (san francisco) airport inbound flight pattern (south of the airport), and just behind/above the power lines across the street, where i quickly caught a glimpse of a bright red light (with some white around the edges) in what appeared to be a chevron or arrow shaped trail pointing straight up into the sky. the shape was not solid, allowing me to see the dark sky through it, so i thought of it as a trail from an unseen object upon first glance. it appeared to be some distance away (miles) but inside the atmosphere.

i do not believe i actually saw it appear, because as soon as it caught my eye, it simply blinked out of existence. there was no fade or gradual dimming like i've seen from meteor/asteroid or rocket contrail, and the direction of the foci (point of the arrow/chevron) was straight up, which is normally opposite direction of either of these phenomenon.

it was definitely like nothing i have seen before, so i was surprised. i immediately thought it was a rocket contrail, but the light just disappeared like someone flipped a switch off. there was no motion to the shape itself. it stayed in the same position from the time i first saw it, until the time it disappeared (approx. 2 seconds). i searched the sky to look for any cause, or reappearance for several minutes, but saw nothing similar or related.
content.summary: Bright red arrow arrow chevron shaped emission trail in eastern sky disappeared suddenly over san francisco airport

content.detailedDescription:
Was traveling to my camp. drove thru town of wharton, pa and saw this object above tree lines. at first since trees were there i thought someone must have mounted a light to warn airplanes from a tower. then it looked like a balloon that was traveling at night.

i drove north west  2.5 miles to my camp. was unpacking vehicle and when i walked outside the object was there hovering over the country lane. no trees just object. i ran in and got my cell phone. shot two photos. was just staring at it. we have no cell coverage up there. went into camp to get binoculars and ran out and it was gone.  i ran down lane and no signs of it. 

i had the photos looked at by several people who do chinese lanterns and they say that this is not a lantern.
content.summary: Fireball ufo

content.detailedDescription: I live in a rural area and when it is moonless and clear sometimes i like to watch for sats. and shooting stars. i was looking towards the southeast and seen what looked like a slow moving meteor that appeared to be headed in my general direction since it wasn't streaking fast. i thought i was going to see a nice meteor since it was getting brighter and i was hoping to see one of the meteors that splits apart but this was not what happened. it got brighter and brighter then seemed to stop at which point it reversed direction 180 degrees and headed back the way it came growing dimmer as it went. this was very surprising to me since i have watched meteors and stars and man made objects for a long time. i could tell it was in the upper atmosphere. by the time i thought to yell for my wife it had faded from sight. she said i was nuts but i know what i seen. i would not be reporting this but since i seen your program mufon hanger one and they said missouri was a hot spot i figure it would not hurt to at least report this. meteors do not reverse direction and as high up as this was it was not a aircraft especially as bright as it got right before reversing direction. i do not want any publicity as i am not looking for fame i just want to report a sighting.
content.summary: A light that grew brighter then reveresed direction and faded

content.detailedDescription: I was watching two red tailed hawks in the sky.  saw a strange movement out of the corner of my eye.  when i looked it was very hard to see.  but when you saw it it was very distinct even though it was nearly transparent. it was boomerang shaped but round not triangular. almost thought it was a flock of birds at first or maybe a trail from a jet or plane.  but when i watched it it was perfectly rounded on the leading edge, which was slightly darker and the only aspect of it that gave it away. it was also very high.  it was almost invisible if it wasn't for the leading edge.  when watching it it did appear that there was more to it than just the leading edge.  its hard to describe but it was a little blurry behind it.  it was flying almost directly from the north to the south.  it was a little cloudy and i lost sight of it after about 30 seconds.  i know that i have never seen anything like it before. i am unable to explain it that is why i am reporting it here. i did some research on the web. most of the images i found were triangles. but i found one image that is identical to what i saw.
content.summary: A very high altitude, large, boomerang but rounded.  only leading edge visible but with transparent shimery-ness following

content.detailedDescription:
Myself and two others were sitting on a hilltop watching the sun set in the western oklahoma sky about 7:45pm.  right above the cloud line appeared a ball of light, the size of a star but much brighter and closer, we thought maybe it could be the space station going by. 
the light stayed in the same spot for about two minutes then 2 smaller orb looking shapes appeared directly under it. the bright light began to get very dim as if it was moving away. we thought it was gone then out of nowhere the bright orb exploded as if it hit something, there was a large ball of fire in the sky, it happened so fast.
right after, it left what looked like a cloud of smoke.
the pictures enclosed are immediately after it exploded.
content.summary: It started out looking like a bright star then exploded.

content.detailedDescription:
Me and my girlfriend went outside to smoke a cigarette a little after 10:30. nice clear night with very little clouds in the area. we were looking at the stars and planes and watching for unusual stuff bc last week we had seen something that peaked our interest. (last event was witnessed by me, my gf, my mom and dad, 4 witnesses in total.  i have done research on this and watched videos of iridium flares, and it could be that, but after it turned away, instead of staying white, it turned red) 

however, last night while watching a plane we noticed a bright flash. at first i thought it to be a firefly in the corner of my eye. however after staring at the spot where we had seen it for about 3 minutes, it went off again, in the same location. it was above the trees and was just a quick on and off flash. almost as if someone up in the sky had a flashlight and was signaling. this happened about every 2-3 minutes. and each time i thought it was done and about to turn to go in, it flashed. after a while i was feeling like whatever it was was doing it on purpose to toy with me. 

after about the 8th time it went off i went in to get my dad, but when he came out it didn't go off, which just made us look like we were making it up. but he believed us bc of what we all saw last week. anyway, at first i wasn't going to report this bc i just reported something last week and i don't want to appear like i'm crazy or doing this for attention. just seems like theres something going on recently in the waukesha/brookfield area. thanks for your time
content.summary: Flash of bright white coming from stationary object

content.detailedDescription:
July 15, 2014 - we were lounging in the grass of the backyard with our dogs when i noted a black, triangular shape object hovering (stationary) above our house. we were both laying on our back and it was directly above us in the sky. 
i looked at it for at least a minute before pointing it out to my boyfriend, who then also studied it...He confirmed that it was black (or at least dark) and triangular shaped. 
i'm not terribly great with direction, but it seemed to be pointing in an easterly direction...As we lay there discussing it for at least another minute, we watched the object slowly rotate (as if on an axis) in the completely opposite direction (west) - making no noise and showing no fuel trails- and then it was just gone.
it didn't disappear so much as zoomed off at such a fast pace as to make it seem instantaneous.
(i do not know if this is pertinent but i had been pointing at it at the time it turned and disappeared)
content.summary: Triangular dark ufo spotted hovering over our house before abrupt rotation and then immediate exit

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i observed a disc shaped white glowing object on evening of 8/28/14 at approx 7:54pm. we know standard aircraft and have never seen anything like this or made an actual ufo report ever. this was not a plane or copter.

the glowing disc made high speed movements, abrupt turns, ascending and descending, hovering. eventually is disappeared into tree lines. we tried chasing but lost track of the object.

this was in owings mills md, near a major road intersection and fairly heavy traffic. we first noticed the object coming up to a traffic light and saw it to our left over tree lines. we saw the strange glow and thought this in not a plane or any standard aircraft that we know. the object moved in paths in fast abrupt movements, ascending, descending, hovering, abrupt directional changes. we tried chasing but lost track when the object vanished near tree lines.

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving home at 2:10am and noticed a streaming light falling from the sky, coming from the north, falling southeast. it appeared to stop right in my line of sight with where the pleadies were in the sky, and increased in intensity. during this time it increased in brightness and apparent size, the trail faded. as soon as the trail was gone, the object appeared to decrease in intensity and apparent size, and sped off to the east-southeast at a rapid pace, leaving a streaming trail behind. 
i work at the base in nearby lemoore, and have been in the military over 20 years. this was unlike anything i have ever witnessed, and certainly was no type of aircraft i have ever seen.
content.summary: Bright light east of hanford, ca

content.detailedDescription: One bright light hovered and made several patterned coloured light signals.. bright white,gold/yellow,red blue.. i watched it for 5 mins and it didn't move at all, then two more appeared from either side of my window frame so im not sure where they came from but they only had red and blue lights, these moved very quickly and after thinking they were going to collide one then seemed to disappear and the other turned 90 degrees towards the first bright one.. i then went to get my other half and when we got back only the first one was there.. i fell asleep so im unsure of how long it was there for.
content.summary: Several lights over aylsham
